author: Sean L
title: Trip to NY - Review
text: This place is amazing in d√©cor, service room amenities and overall experience. My new Favorite in NY, The food and beverage, Staff and location are all excellent. I recommend both dinner in the restaurant or room service. The wine by the glass list for Italian wines is outstanding and the staff are all very knowledgeable.
